Deprecated Methods
org.mt4j.input.inputProcessors.componentProcessors.lassoProcessor.LassoProcessor.addClusterable(ILassoable)
          renamed, use addLassoable() instead. 
org.mt4j.util.font.FontManager.createFont(PApplet, String, int, MTColor, MTColor)
          from now on, only a single font color is supported for conformity across factories 
org.mt4j.util.font.fontFactories.IFontFactory.createFont(PApplet, String, int, MTColor, MTColor)
          font system only allows a single font color now 
org.mt4j.util.font.FontManager.createFont(PApplet, String, int, MTColor, MTColor, boolean)
          from now on, only a single font color is supported for conformity across factories 
org.mt4j.util.font.fontFactories.IFontFactory.createFont(PApplet, String, int, MTColor, MTColor, boolean)
          font system only allows a single font color now 
org.mt4j.components.MTComponent.getBoundingShape()
          renamed to getBounds 
org.mt4j.util.animation.AnimationEvent.getCurrentStepDelta()
          use getDelta() instead 
org.mt4j.util.animation.AnimationEvent.getCurrentValue()
          use getValue() instead 
org.mt4j.components.visibleComponents.shapes.AbstractShape.getHeightXYVectLocal()
          this method should actually be private. Use getHeightXY(Transformspace.LOCAL) instead! 
org.mt4j.input.inputData.AbstractCursorInputEvt.getPosX()
          use getScreenX() 
org.mt4j.input.inputData.AbstractCursorInputEvt.getPosY()
          use getScreenY() 
org.mt4j.input.InputManager.getRegisteredInputSources()
          use getInputSources() instead 
org.mt4j.util.xml.svg.CustomPathHandler.getReverseMoveToStack()
          Only used when the intention is to draw the shapes using the stencil buffer.. 
org.mt4j.util.xml.svg.CustomPathHandler.getReverseMoveToVertices()
          Only used when the intention is to draw the shapes using the stencil buffer.. 
org.mt4j.util.MT4jSettings.getScreenCenter()
          - use getWindowCenter() 
org.mt4j.util.MT4jSettings.getScreenHeight()
          renamed to getWindowHeight() since this doesent return the screen height, but the MT4j window's height 
org.mt4j.util.MT4jSettings.getScreenWidth()
          renamed to getWindowWidth() since this doesent return the screen width, but the MT4j window's width 
org.mt4j.input.inputData.MTInputEvent.getTargetComponent()
          use getTarget() instead 
org.mt4j.util.animation.AnimationEvent.getTargetObject()
          use getTaget() instead 
org.mt4j.components.visibleComponents.shapes.AbstractShape.getWidthXYVectLocal()
          this method should actually be private. Use getWidthXY(Transformspace.LOCAL) instead! 
org.mt4j.sceneManagement.AbstractScene.init()
          renamed to onEnter(), init() is only kept for backwards compatibility 
org.mt4j.components.MTComponent.isBoundingShapeSet()
          renamed to hasBounds 
org.mt4j.IPAppletDesktop.openStream(String)
          As of release 0136, use createInput() instead. 
org.mt4j.components.MTComponent.setBoundingShape(IBoundingShape)
          renamed to setBounds 
org.mt4j.sceneManagement.AbstractScene.shutDown()
          renamed to onLeave(), shutDown() is only kept for backwards compatibility
